name: Absolution
description: “Absolution” A spiritual journey in the realms of sin, fear and forgiveness. “And I, by his power given me, forgive and absolve you from all your sins, in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit. Amen” For every good deed in life there is a bad. We have all wronged someone, we have all made mistakes, we have all failed at some point in our life. There comes a time where we must face our sins, confront our mistakes and seek absolution & forgiveness, for death brings judgement upon us. But we shouldn’t care about higher powers judging us. We must search within our soul to correct and heal the wrongs we have done. And that is my journey of Absolution.
